name: Dumb Ways To Die Codelnpce Edition
name_original: Dumb Ways To Die Codelnpce Edition
description:
Dumb Ways To Die WhiteShaped Edition

WhiteShaped Called Abbreviation For WS

Characters Characters From Codelnpce

Decorations 13

Shops 2

Minigames 28

Practices 15

Series 3

Lives 3

How To Play

We Are Practicing To Complete This Minigame, Get Several Score In Game, You Must Avoid To Fail.

If You Fail Minigame, You Lose A Life.

Dumb Ways To Die Is Puzzle Game, 20 Minigames, Objectives, Decorations,

Treasures

Chests

Chest: can you get more coins

The Challenge

Nampet584 Driving Car, Avoiding To Hit The Trees, You Are Driving Ten Times Coming The Trees Again, If You Hit A Tree, You Fail, But You Must Try Again.

Get Score Points

When You Complete This Level Without Button Level, Get Score In DWTDWE, However If You Failed This Level Sometimes Get Penalty Points In Minigame Serie.

MB 35.2

Version v.0.4.9
